name: Jump If You Dare
description:
Jump into the hole and face your enemies! There are 3 bosses with 3 holes leading to them. This is my first game jam and my first game so please be as critical as possible. 

The theme for this game jam: Holes

Thank you for playing my game I really hope you enjoy it :).

Please don't forget to rate my game if you enjoyed it and also post a comment there as well:

https://itch.io/jam/brackeys-3/rate/573977

My record on this game is 80.53  seconds! Can you beat my record?
